71020.「<cs_pchero>さま。遅れて 申し訳ありません。\n ここから 強く 魔:
. I apologize for the delay. I strongly sensed the presence of a monster from here, but I see that you have already
exterminated it.

71021.「星天のペンダントは ここにある\n 何かに 共鳴したはず……。:
The Starry Pendant must have resonated with
something here...

71023.「壊れていますが ペンダントのようです。\n <cs_pchero>さまの倒した:
It is broken, but appears to be a pendant. Did
it belong to the monster that <cs_pchero>
defeated?

71024.「これは……どういうことでしょう？\n このペンダントは 私の持つ\n 星天のペ:
What does this... mean? This pendant is very
similar to my Starry Pendant.

71025.「いえ……。似ているというよりも\n まったく 同じものに……。\n 同じ……同:
No... it's more like... exactly the same
thing... the same... same... pendan... t?

71027.「……メルエ。シャデルが もう何日も\n 冒険から 帰ってきていないそうだ。\n:
Merue. Shadel hasn't been back from his
adventures for days. She went to a dangerous
place, so I wonder if...

71028.「大丈夫よ。すぐに このペンダントを使って\n 無事だって 報告してくるわ。\n:
It's okay. I'll use the pendant to let him
know you're okay. Uncle Shadel is a great
adventurer.

71029.<center>……それから 数日の時が 流れても\nシャデル叔父さんからの連絡:
...A few days passed and I never heard from
Uncle Shadel again.

71030.「シャデル叔父さんは 誰も行ったことがない\n すごい場所で 冒険の真っ最中なの:
Uncle Shadel is in the middle of an adventure in an amazing place where no one has ever been. So, he's been busy. He just hasn't had a
chance to...

71031.「……メルエ。\n 落ち着いて 聞いてほしい。: ...Merue. I want you to calm down and listen.

71032.「シャデルが 見つかった……。\n 洞くつの奥で倒れていたのを\n 他の冒険者が:
Shadel had been found... by another
adventurer, lying in the depths of a cave,
already...

71034.「いつか…… 私の病気が治ったら\n 一緒に冒険しようって 約束したのに……。\:
You promised that someday... when I was cured,
we would have an adventure together... but
why? Ugh, ugh...

71036.「あなたは……誰？\n どうして こんな所にいるの？: Who are you? What are you doing here?

71038.「ボク……帰らなくちゃいけなくて……。\n だけど 追いだされてしまったから\n:
I had to go home but I couldn't go home alone
because they kicked me out.

71040.「おねえちゃん ボクといっしょに\n 帰ってくれないかな。おねえちゃんと\n い:
Young lady, will you come home with me? I'm
sure I can go home with you.

71041.「そしたら ボク…… おねえちゃんの頼み\n どんなことでも きいてあげるよ！: And I'll do whatever you ask, young lady!

71043.「私は……自分の足で 歩けないの。\n この部屋から出ることさえ できないのよ。:
I can't... walk on my own two feet. I can't
even leave this room. I can't go with you.

71044.「わかった。\n それが お姉ちゃんの願いなんだね？: I understand. That's what you want, isn't it?

71047.「絶対に治らないって\n どんなお医者様も さじを投げたのよ？\n それが どう:
Every doctor who ever gave me the cold
shoulder said I'd never get better, right? How
did you...?

71049.「これで ボクといっしょに帰ってくれるよね？: Now you'll come home with me, right?

71052.「……すべてを 思いだしました。\n いったい何が 私を\n 世告げの姫として:
I remembered everything. What in the world had
moved me to become the Oracle Princess?

71053.「ありがとうございます <cs_pchero>さま。\n 心ばかりの品ですが 受:
Thank you <cs_pchero>. I know it's just a
thoughtful gesture, but please accept it.

71054.「……私に 冒険の話を聞かせてくれた\n シャデル叔父さんは この砂岩の洞くつで:
...I believe that my Uncle Shadel, who told me
stories of his adventures, was attacked and
killed by monsters in this Sandstone Cave.

71055.「ですが 最期に 私の記憶を取り戻す\n きっかけを 残してくれましたね……。:
But at the end of the day, you have left me
with a chance to remember...

71056.「決戦の時は 近づいています。\n <cs_pchero>さまは コゼットを訪ね:
The time for the decisive battle is
approaching. <cs_pchero> visit Cosette and
go to Rhodia's side.

71231.<center>世告げの姫となる前の私は\n自由のない カゴの中の鳥でした。:
Before I became Oracle Princess, I was a bird
in a cage with no freedom.

71232.<center>……私は 生まれつき 重い病をわずらい\n自分の足で 立つことも:
I was born with a serious illness that left me
unable to stand on my own two feet.

71233.<center>このペンダントは 父が用意してくれたもの。\nどんなに離れていて:
This pendant was provided by my father. No
matter how far apart we were, the pendants had
the magic to allow us to talk to each other.

71234.<center>ペンダントの片方は 部屋から出られない私を\nふびんに思った父が:
My father, who was unhappy with my inability
to leave my room, gave one of the pendants to
my Uncle Shadel, an adventurer.

71235.<center>私の 唯一の楽しみは\nシャデル叔父さんが ペンダント越しに\n:
My only pleasure is when Uncle Shadel tells me
stories of his adventures through the pendant.
